About me

I have been working for seven years as a journalist, content writer, and social media manager since I graduated from the Faculty of Political Science. I saw many times during my career that an attractive and fast-loading WordPress site is one of the most effective tools for company promotion. 

A modern web page provides several possibilities for a successful presence on the Internet. As a WordPress expert, I will offer to you the best solution to connect with customers and make your products global available. It will reduce your costs of sales, delivery, and advertising.

How can I help you?

Creating Websites

Depending on the activity and the area in which you operate, we will consider several options for creating a website.

A static web page, webshop, or blog are solutions that can increase income and help to surpass the competition.

Improve Your Site Performance

Attractive web pages are dysfunctional if they load slowly. You know very well that time is money.

I’ll be happy to speed up your website loading so that clients and business associates have information, product, or service immediately available.

Troubleshooting

How many times did your site go down? The biggest nightmare of companies and entrepreneurs is a site crash or errors that prevent pages from loading. 

I can successfully solve these problems as well. All data will be saved and quickly available to site visitors.
